modName: Noldorian Re-texture of the Royal Elven Set
summary: Noldorian Re-texture provides a new, unique and highly detailed variant of the popular Royal Elven Set by the Roadstroker. This is a lore-friendly sexy but not skimpy light female armour set which makes not only Elven girls stand out.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x2BzAl.jpg[/IMG]


About the mod

As I am a true lover of Tolkien's Elves I've always tried to bring true Elven beauty and grace to my favourite game's world. Ever since I have looked for the ultimate armour for a female Elven warrior, but could not succeed in finding one, until the Roadstroker created his fantastic Royal Elven Armour. The only downside to it - in my eyes - was its colour and the lack of metal armour parts and so I started from zero, knowing nothing about armour texturing at all and built this new version of this fantastic armour set, according to Tolkien lore, which also fits very well into Tamriel.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery beyond and in the image section of this mod.

Statwise it is lore friendly, strong but not overpowered and fully temperable and enchantable.


Lore background

- coming soon -


Required mods

As a re-texture project my Noldorian Re-texture requires the original Royal Elven Set by the Roadstroker to provide the necessary meshes and game implementation. You can find it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25083]here[/url].


Installation

1. Install the Roadstrokers [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25083]original Royal Elven Set[/url]. Installation notes can be found on his mod page.

2. Download the Noldorian Re-texture and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override.


Un- installation

Please refer to the un-installation notes for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25083]Royal Elven Set[/url].

Credits

Credits go to...

- the Roadstroker for being awesome and giving me the permission to do this retexture
of his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25083]Royal Elven Set[/url]
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of learning how to do a decent texturing work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of beta testers :

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3421798]bassbil[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1784046]netherwalk[/url]

The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. THANK YOU SO MUCH!


Permissions

You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.


Gallery

Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the "Credits" section. Enjoy it!

Author's note :

If you like this mod please take a second to endorse and leave a comment or load up a picture - I will really apprechiate it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
